short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide articles from obnoxious New York Times opinion writers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Want to read the New York Times without getting distracted by clickbait headlines and opinion writers you aren't interested in? imho lets you hide articles from opinion writers you don't want to hear from. Install the extension, choose authors to block, and reclaim your attention!
